summary: Frontend-only testing of tactical military video game styling across all pages. All 5 pages tested (Login, Dashboard, Settings, Install Guide, Eve AI) have consistent tactical military styling with dark backgrounds, orange accent colors, card-tactical styling, font-tactical fonts, and military terminology.
critical_code_review_comments: All pages consistently use tactical CSS classes from index.css
Login.jsx: bg-tactical-animated, card-tactical, font-tactical, btn-tactical, input-tactical, text-glow-orange
Dashboard.jsx: card-tactical (8), font-tactical (45), btn-tactical, orange accents (56), zinc text (100)
Settings.jsx: bg-tactical-animated, card-tactical (5), font-tactical (29), btn-tactical (3), orange accents (35)
InstallGuide.jsx: bg-tactical-animated, card-tactical (5), font-tactical (24), btn-tactical, text-glow-orange
EveAI.jsx: card-tactical (3), font-tactical (28), btn-tactical (2), input-tactical, text-glow-blue, orange accents (45)

success_rate.frontend: 100% - All 5 pages have consistent tactical military styling

context_for_next_testing_agent: Tactical military styling verified across all pages. Key CSS classes used: bg-tactical-animated, card-tactical, font-tactical, btn-tactical, input-tactical, text-glow-orange, text-glow-blue. All pages have dark backgrounds (zinc/black), orange accent colors, and military terminology.
